episodes.title: Her Parents Were In The Manson Family
episodes.description: In this riveting episode of The Day Before It Happened Podcast with Rachel Rose, you'll meet a woman who bares her soul about a past shadowed by the Manson Family legacy.   With raw vulnerability, she recount the tumultuous journey from being born into cult chaos, to battling addiction, and ultimately finding redemption. This isn't just a story of survival—it's an inspiring testimony to the resilience of the human spirit.  As the child of Manson Family members, her life was marked by violence, drugs, and the struggle to escape the generational curses that haunted her for decades. From witnessing the horrors of cult life to enduring personal tragedies, her story is a candid exploration of the darkest corners of trauma and the astonishing power of faith and healing.  This transformative narrative is for anyone who believes in second chances and the extraordinary strength we possess to rewrite our destinies. It's a reminder that even from the depths of despair, hope can emerge, and a new life can begin.  I invite you to listen, reflect, and share your thoughts. Your engagement means the world to us and to those who find solace in stories like hers.   Don't forget to like, comment, and subscribe for more heartfelt narratives that challenge, inspire, and uplift.  #HealingAndRecovery #HealingJourney #FindingPeace #SurvivingAbuse #MansonFamily   CHAPTERS: 0:00 - Intro 0:30 - Manson Family Origins 5:20 - Chaos in Mother's Life 8:30 - Life in a Trap House 11:00 - Child Protective Services Intervention 13:40 - Adoption and New Family Life 19:59 - Misguided Quest for Love 22:39 - Teenage Pregnancy Challenges 26:00 - Teen Escapes Home 27:30 - Las Vegas Adult Industry Entry 29:23 - First Encounter with Meth 31:05 - Second Meth Experience 35:35 - Tragic Meth Use Consequences 40:33 - Mourning Partner Wes 42:50 - Surviving a Shooting Incident 48:55 - Police Raid Ordeal 54:15 - Spiritual Awakening in Prison 57:30 - Divine Communication and Change 1:01:20 - Embracing Submission and Freedom 1:06:34 - Escaping Survival Mode 1:08:14 - Self-Worth Realization 1:09:57 - Secular vs Spiritual Mindsets 1:11:58 - Podcast Conclusion  ------------------------------------------------------------ Listen on Spotify and Apple Podcasts Spotify: https://open.spotify.com/show/3LANL2oGyVqKkh4TM15Vuk Apple Podcasts: https://podcasts.apple.com/us/podcast/the-day-before-it-happened/id1715045836  Follow on social media for more content related to the stories you’ve heard here: Website: https://www.thedaybeforeithappened.com Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/thedaybeforeithappened Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/daybeforeithappened  If you have a trauma story you’d like to share with the world please email rachel@therachelrose.com  We weren’t meant to face this incredibly hard life alone. You’re doing the best you can with the tools and resources you have. Don’t give up. If you are struggling and need immediate help:  https://988lifeline.org  ------------------------------------------------------------ Listen on Spotify and Apple Podcasts Spotify: https://open.spotify.com/show/3LANL2oGyVqKkh4TM15Vuk Apple Podcasts: https://podcasts.apple.com/us/podcast/the-day-before-it-happened/id1715045836  Follow on social media for more content related to the stories you’ve heard here: Website: https://www.thedaybeforeithappened.com Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/thedaybeforeithappened Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/daybeforeithappened  If you have a trauma story you’d like to share with the world please email rachel@therachelrose.com  We weren’t meant to face this incredibly hard life alone. You’re doing the best you can with the tools and resources you have.  Don’t give up. If you are struggling and need immediate help:  https://988lifeline.org
